projects.title: Cloud Storage
projects.subtitle: Store files securely on a remote server featuring file sharing, direct download links, and more.
projects.description: A custom cloud storage solution implementing frontend, backend and database skills.  With a ReactJS frontend supported by ReactSuite's component library and a backend built on ExpressJS and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.subtitle: A portfolio to showcase all of my works.
projects.description: Showcasing some of my creations in a clean and professional manner.  The website pulls projects from a remote file to allow of easy addition of projects without needing to rebuild the frontend.

projects.title: URL Shortener
projects.subtitle: Shorten your URLs without restriction or ads getting in the way of what matters most.
projects.description: An easy URL shortener with unlimited custom aliases to get your where you need to go.  A ReactJS frontend and a backend built with ExpressJS and GraphQL for reliable communication.

projects.title: Vex Modules
projects.subtitle: Make using your robot better than ever with this collection of modules to improve usability.
projects.description: Smooth motor control and smooth drivetrain to control to control the acceleration of motors reducing strain and improving controllability, Autonomous Select, Mechanum Control, and Image loader.
